document_data.name: Wydda
document_data.titles: Mother{{Cite adventurers league/Eye of the Tempest|36-37}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Wydda''' was the [[monk]] sacristan of the [[Monastery of the Yellow Rose]].
document_data.History: Wydda was a monk of vaguely [[elf|elven]] ancestry from [[Aglarond]] who went to the Monastery of the Yellow Rose, where she became the high cleric.
document_data.Personality: Wydda was patient, wise, and caring. However, she spent more time praying than among her flock. She was impressed by people showing compassion, endurance, or theological knowledge.
document_data.Activities: Wydda was the sacristan of the Temple of [[Ilmater]] inside the Monastery of the Yellow Rose. Her duty was praying and offering guidance to her fellow monks.
